item.title: Trope Talk: Musical Numbers
item.description:
Snap your gaze to the middle distance, hit "play" on your device of choice or just let the editor pick a jam and slap it on your big moment! Today let's talk about how music can be used in mostly-non-music storytelling!
Our content is intended for teenage audiences and up.
GET AURORA VOLUME 1: https://comicaurora.com/books/
PATREON: https://www.Patreon.com/OSP
PODCAST: https://overlysarcasticpodcast.transistor.fm/subscribe
DISCORD: https://discord.gg/osp
MERCH: https://overlysarcastic.shop/
OUR WEBSITE: https://www.OverlySarcasticProductions.com/ Find us on Bluesky https://bsky.app/profile/overlysarcastic.bsky.social Find us on Reddit https://www.Reddit.com/r/OSP/

item.title: Finding the Best Episodes of Love, Death + Robots (Detail Diatribe)
item.description:
📌📌 AURORA PINS! 📌📌 The Floof Squad has arrived – Kendal, Alinua, Falst, and Erin are available as enamel pins in our merch shop, and they glow in the dark! https://overlysarcastic.shop/
Red has journeyed through 45 episodes of sci-fi anthology madness in pursuit of one elusive goal: finding a way to get comfortably normal people with normal media consumption habits into the weird parts of science fiction without them immediately going mad!
Our content is intended for teenage audiences and up.
GET AURORA VOLUME 1: https://comicaurora.com/books/
PATREON: https://www.Patreon.com/OSP
PODCAST: https://overlysarcasticpodcast.transistor.fm/subscribe

item.title: Gotye's "Making Mirrors" is music mastery – Detail Diatribe
item.description:
AURORA PINS! THE FLOOF SQUAD HAS ARRIVED! Kendal Alinua Falst and Erin are available as an enamel pin pack, and they glow in the dark! Grab them here: https://overlysarcastic.shop/
Yes yes yes, "Somebody That I Used To Know" is still a bop, but the rest of Gotye's album "Making Mirrors" is Also Amazing, and it's time we all appreciated that.
SOURCES & Further Reading: – Videos – "Making Making Mirrors" from Gotye's YouTube channel https://youtu.be/2ZXLyeatI0s?si=ydI3uuxEXJSiwaQG "The Making of Eyes Wide Open" from Gotye's YouTube channel https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=b_iuE_L2wys "Starting "Don't Pull Away" with Gotye (DNA update #48)" by J.Views https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=TadydHA3VPE "Gotye Interview: Somebody That I Used To Know & State of the Art" by Michael Martin https://youtu.be/xM9L3WgYrQc?si=qI0VjKHjofDEWOxQ – Web Interviews – "Gotye" by Evan Schlansky for American Songwriter https://americansongwriter.com/gotye/ "Interview with Gotye: Giving Him A Chan
